word_group.brief_definition: 卫生部部长；医疗部长；卫生大臣
青年牧师；青年部长；青年大臣

bilingual.target: 我们的部长非常有经验。

bilingual.source: He was appointed as a cabinet minister.
The minister is responsible for the education sector.
The minister announced a new policy today.
bilingual.target: 部长今天宣布了一项新政策。

bilingual.source: The minister will visit the school next week.
bilingual.target: 部长下周将访问这所学校。

bilingual.source: The minister expressed support for the project.
bilingual.target: 部长对这个项目表示支持。

bilingual.source: The minister gave a speech at the international conference.
bilingual.target: 部长在国际会议上发表了演讲。

list.abstract: Minister是一个英文单词，名词译为部长，大臣，牧师，公使，动词译为辅助，服侍，执行牧师职务。

yingyinNormal.en: That's Dad's boss. Cornelius Fudge, Minister of Magic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我爸爸的上司，康尼留斯·夫子，魔法部部长。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Who's Cathy spoken to? Foreign Minister hasn't returned her call.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凯茜给谁打电话呢？外交部长仍未回电话。

yingyinNormal.en: You will change your mind. Thank you for seeing me, First Minister Hennessy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会改变主意的。第一部长汉尼斯先生，感谢您接见我。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll have Secretary Durant work with your foreign minister, and then we'll take it from there. Are you open to that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会让国务卿杜兰特跟你的外交部长接洽，然后我们再谈，这样可以吗？

yingyinNormal.en: My contacts in Beijing tell me the minister of commerce is in a tizzy. Wants to use this as an excuse to start clenching fists.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在北京的联系人跟我说商务部部长很激动，他想以此为借口重拳出击。

yingyinNormal.en: You're the one who's been phoning. Yes. I phoned many times. I'm afraid the Deputy Minister is busy and won't be able to see you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您就是一直打电话过来的那位。是的。我打过很多次电话了。副部长很忙，恐怕无法来见您。

yingyinNormal.en: But, make no mistake, Deputy First Minister, you are ours now. I say jump, you say where. You're on the next flight back to London.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但第一副部长别再犯错误了，你现在在我们的掌控中。你现在只能唯命是从。你马上坐下一班飞机回伦敦。

yingyinNormal.en: It's contingent. The minister won't proceed with our tariff deal if we don't give him assurances that the rescue is underway. Why do the Chinese care so much about what's on this Russian boat?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这事得视情况而定。如果希望部长继续关税交易，我们必须向他保证救援已经开展。中方为何如此关心这艘俄罗斯船上有什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Do I need to speak to the Prime Minister?
yingyinNormal.zh: 要我去跟总理谈谈吗？

yingyinNormal.en: He is a trusted minister. I am his Queen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是个值得信任的臣子，而我是皇后。

yingyinNormal.en: And it was, Prime Minister. I can assure you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那确实是，我能向您保证。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God. I'm gonna have to find another minister.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天啊，我得再去找位牧师。

yingyinNormal.en: Ilsa Faust, Prime Minister. She disappeared 2 years ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首相大人，是伊尔莎·福斯特，她在两年前失踪了。

yingyinNormal.en: We are in agreement. And my father's minister will capitulate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们意见一致，我父王的臣子会做出让步的。

yingyinNormal.en: And Minister Ahmad will wait with the convoy by the horses.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾哈迈德大人会和侍从一起在马旁等待。

yingyinNormal.en: What about the second minister we meet with? I kinda liked him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二位牧师如何？我还蛮喜欢他的。

yingyinNormal.en: I've given the Prime Minister my personal assurance you're on the case.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我亲自向首相保证你在积极破案。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's easy. Anyone can go online and get ordained as a minister.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那简单，谁都可以上网受任当证婚牧师。

yingyinNormal.en: Jia Sidao, the prime minister who vanquished the demon and saved the Song.
yingyinNormal.zh: 宰相贾似道，击败了魔鬼拯救了大宋。

yingyinNormal.en: No, Minister Antonius. I'm afraid that is not what we were toasting at all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，安东尼厄斯大臣，恐怕这不是我们举杯庆贺的理由。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Ministers</highlight> should also look at creating greater certainty in the rental environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 部长们还应该考虑在租赁环境中创造更大的确定性。

examination_example.sentence: The communities <highlight>minister</highlight> hinted that he may introduce more flexibility to the current cap on the amount .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社区部长暗示，他可能会对目前的金额上限引入更多的灵活性。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 管理；经营；政府；分发；给予；服用；行政管理；行政部门；公众事务管理；遗产管理
n. 管理者；管理人员；遗产管理人；资产管理人
v. 管理；分发；实施；负责执行；监管；给予；主持（圣礼；尤指圣餐）仪式；主持

word_family.mean: n. 部长；大臣；牧师；执行者；传达者；公使；教长；外交使节

examination_example.sentence: The culture <highlight>minister</highlight>, Franck Riester, said religious relics saved from the cathedral were being securely held at the Hôtel de Ville.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文化部长Franck Riester表示，从大教堂救出的宗教文物正被妥善安置在巴黎市政厅。

examination_example.sentence: The interior <highlight>minister</highlight>, Christophe Castaner, visited the cathedral on Tuesday afternoon to see the extent of the devastation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Christophe Castaner周二下午视察了这座大教堂，了解了地震破坏的程度。

examination_example.sentence: After the blaze was declared completely extinguished, 15 hours after it started, the junior interior <highlight>minister</highlight> said the structure had been saved but remained vulnerable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大火持续了15小时后被完全扑灭，初级内政部长表示该建筑得以幸存，但仍然岌岌可危。

examination_example.sentence: Nigeria's <highlight>minister</highlight> of agriculture, has warned that the pest may "create serious problems for food security" in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尼日利亚(Nigeria)农业部长发出警告称，这种害虫可能会“给该国的粮食安全造成严重问题”。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: First <highlight>Minister</highlight> Nicola Sturgeon urged ScottishPower to reduce carbon emissions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首席部长Nicola Sturgeon敦促苏格兰电力公司减少碳排放。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>minister</highlight> is also pushing to stop public transportation from being cut in ways that leave people isolated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位部长还在努力阻止公共交通中断，以免人们被孤立。

examination_example.sentence: The transport <highlight>minister</highlight> advised people in parts of Scotland covered by the orange alert to avoid travel on Wednesday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交通部长建议出现橙色警报的苏格兰部分地区的居民周三避免出行。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Helen stars in the play, about Queen Elizabeth II and her private meetings with twelve Prime <highlight>Ministers</highlight> in the course of sixty years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海伦在这部戏剧中出演，这部戏剧讲述了英国女王伊丽莎白二世以及她在60年间与12位首相的私人会晤。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The prime <highlight>minister</highlight> was called to the palace.
According to the passage, both the prime <highlight>minister</highlight> and the banker felt unhappy because they always worried about losing what they had got.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据文章，首相和银行家都感到不高兴，因为他们总是担心失去他们所拥有的。

examination_example.sentence: China's Foreign <highlight>Minister</highlight> Mr. Wang Yi highly praised Edgar Snow (1905-1972).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国外交部长王毅先生高度赞扬了Edgar Snow(1905-1972)。
